    Calculates industry energy shares for IEA data

    calc_iea_industry_shares.Rd

    Calculates both for input (from the U matrix) and for outputs (from the V matrix). All incoming PSUT matrix columns in psut_df are dropped. The output is two coumns of column vectors.

    calc_iea_industry_shares(
  psut_df,
  trim_cols = TRUE,
  R = Recca::psut_cols$R,
  U = Recca::psut_cols$U,
  U_feed = Recca::psut_cols$U_feed,
  U_eiou = Recca::psut_cols$U_eiou,
  r_eiou = Recca::psut_cols$r_eiou,
  V = Recca::psut_cols$V,
  Y = Recca::psut_cols$Y,
  S_units = Recca::psut_cols$S_units,
  Y_fu_details = Recca::psut_cols$Y_fu_details,
  U_eiou_fu_details = Recca::psut_cols$U_eiou_fu_details,
  input_fractions_column = "U_fractions",
  output_fractions_column = "V_fractions"
)

    Arguments

    psut_df

    A data frame of PSUT matrices

    trim_cols

    A boolean that tells whether to eliminate matrix columns on output. Default is TRUE.

    R, U_feed, U_eiou, r_eiou, Y, S_units, Y_fu_details, U_eiou_fu_details

    Columns deleted on output.

    U

    The name of the U matrix in psut_df. This column is deleted on output. Default is "U".

    V

    The name of the V matrix in psut_df. This column is deleted on output. Default is "V".

    input_fractions_column

    The name of the output column that contains vectors of input fractions.

    output_fractions_column

    The name of the output column that contains vectors of output fractions.

    Value

    A version of psut_df with input and output industry shares added as column vectors at the right side of the data frame.

    Contents

    Developed by Matthew Heun.
